name: Baume
author: Euler
notes: Got to Legend 3 with DHeroes, got screwed by nutty Sylvan Mills and CAs a few times and dropped back to Legend 2 so I decided to give Sylvans a try myself even though I'm still missing a Shroom. Chalice is good against about anything in the current Meta and ECon makes the CA Matchup almost free if you use the toggle correctly while also giving so many Otk opportunities.
